attributes.action: Crack down on bogus calling by taking stronger action towards the issue and to issue new acts upon offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our day to day lives continue to grow further into the future, we, the general public are faced with the rising issue of bogus/cold calling. The government has not taken enough steps to control the issue of bogus calling, relentless of their current actions, and need to reconsider their approaches to tackling it. There is no reason not to improve upon what has already been achieved for a better morale of the majority of the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
